channel.title: Weathered Technology on Error States
channel.description: Recent content in Weathered Technology on Error States

item.title: 012 - Link NYC, Part 2
item.description: A few new additions to the Weathered Tech x LinkNYC canon. They remind me of the famous opening lines of Anna Karenina: ‘Happy families are all alike; every unhappy family is unhappy in its own way.’ Perhaps the new tag line for ErrorStates should be, ‘Working technologies are all alike; but every technology is broken in its own way.’ [Continue Reading]
